title: Taiwan Insurers Slash Currency Hedges to Record as Reserves Rise
description: Taiwan’s life insurers have cut their currency hedging to a record low, while boosting their buffer against foreign-exchange risks to give themselves a greater capacity to ride out any potential volatility.
content: Taiwan’s life insurers have cut their currency hedging to a record low, while boosting their buffer against foreign-exchange risks to give themselves a greater capacity to ride out any potential volatility.
